advancement.create.andesite_alloy.desc: Obtain some Ash Alloy, Create's most important resource
advancement.create.andesite_casing.desc: Apply Ash Alloy to stripped wood, creating a basic casing for your machines
create.ponder.cogwheel_casing.text_1: Brass or Ash Alloy Casing can be used to decorate Cogwheels
create.ponder.brass_funnel.text_1: Ash Alloy Funnels can only ever extract single items.
create.ponder.belt_casing.text_1: Brass or Ash Alloy Casing can be used to decorate Mechanical Belts
create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_1: Ash Alloy Tunnels can be used to cover up your belts
create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_2: Whenever an Ash Alloy Tunnel has connections to the sides...
create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_3: ...they will split exactly one item off of any passing stacks
create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_4: The remainder will continue on its path
